name: infuse
content:
infuse verb
(EMOTION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T + prep ] to fill someone or something with an emotion or quality: infuse someone/something with something The pulling down of the Berlin Wall infused the world with optimism.infuse something into something The arrival of a group of friends on Saturday infused new life into the weekend.

infuse verb
(DRINK)
[ I or T ] If you infuse a drink or it infuses, you leave substances such as tea leaves or herbs in hot water so that their flavour goes into the liquid: Allow the tea to infuse for five minutes.
